entry.title: Love2d
entry.summary: is a wonderful engine for lua based 2d games, that i have to recommend!

entry.title: Puzzle Game: Hat Cat
entry.summary: and the obvious crimes against the fundamental laws of physics is a mind-boggling 2d puzzle game about space-loops, powered by love2d.

entry.title: One Button Game: Sienna
entry.summary: by tangram is a fun example of the capabillities of the love2d engine!

entry.title: Flash Adventure: Phoenotopia
entry.summary: is a free fun action puzzle platformer! (took me quite some time to finish.)

entry.title: Welcome,
entry.summary:
i am drcicero and this is my going to be my (micro)-blog. From time to time i am going to write a post. Mostly these will consist of links or other forms of recommendations.

Be sure to subscribe using your favorite rss/atom reader.
